title: Academic Writer
job_context: We are seeking creative and detail-oriented Academic Writers to produce high-quality academic content for various subjects. Ideal candidates should have a strong command of the English language and excellent research skills.
job_responsibilities: Writing essays, research papers, and dissertations.
Conducting thorough research and verifying facts.
Meeting deadlines and managing multiple projects.

title: Junior Education Consultant
job_context: Looking for Associate Educational Consultants with a minimum of one year of experience. Responsibilities include guiding students through study abroad applications and writing SOPs/Cover Letters.
job_responsibilities: Conducting one-on-one consultations with students.
Writing SOPs and Cover Letters.
Attending workshops and training.

title: Senior Next.js Developer
job_context: We are looking for a Senior Next.js Developer to lead our development team. Candidates should have extensive experience in Next.js and React.js, with a strong portfolio of projects.
job_responsibilities: Developing and maintaining web applications using Next.js.
Leading code reviews and mentoring junior developers.
Collaborating with UX/UI designers to implement responsive designs.
educational_requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field.

title: Mid Level MERN Developer
job_context: Seeking a Mid Level MERN Developer to join our growing team. Candidates should be proficient in MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
job_responsibilities: Building and maintaining web applications.
Collaborating with team members on application architecture.
Writing clean and maintainable code.
educational_requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field.

title: DevOps Manager
job_context: We are searching for a DevOps Manager to oversee our DevOps team and improve our deployment pipelines and infrastructure.
job_responsibilities: Managing CI/CD processes and automation.
Collaborating with development and IT teams to streamline operations.
Ensuring system reliability and performance.
educational_requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field.

title: Junior Education Consultant
job_context: We are looking for four Associate Educational Consultants management candidates with a minimum of one year of experience. Candidates are responsible for finding genuine candidates and writing a Statement of Purpose (SOP)/Cover Letter for study abroad. Applicants must be fluent in both spoken and written English.
job_responsibilities: Abroad Inquiry office time is from 9:30 am to 6 pm.
Candidates must consider having sufficient time to work in a competitive market before applying.
Writing test to examine Academic English Writing Skills.
Candidates need to show technical skills before joining.
Participation in open handwriting and summary writing exam to test academic writing abilities.
Written test could last up to three hours.
If you want to avoid participating in the academic writing exam, please do not apply for this job.
We want our new colleagues as soon as possible, so keep an eye on your email regularly.
